text: Axel August Berg (8 July 1938 â€“ 12 April 2020) was a Norwegian football winger. He played for Lyn between 1955 and 1965 and the national team from 1959 and 1961. Berg died on 12 April 2020, aged 81. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Norwegian footballers
title: Axel Berg (footballer)
